# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(phoenix_mcp LANGUAGES CXX)
set(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID ${CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID})

# target
add_executable(PhoenixMcp "")
set_target_properties(PhoenixMcp PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "PhoenixMcp")
set_target_properties(PhoenixMcp PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/linux/x86_64/release")
add_dependencies(PhoenixMcp phoenix_mcp)
target_compile_options(PhoenixMcp PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CUDA>:-DNDEBUG>
)
set_target_properties(PhoenixMcp PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(PhoenixMcp PRIVATE cxx_std_20)
if(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
    target_compile_options(PhoenixMcp PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-O2>)
else()
    target_compile_options(PhoenixMcp PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
else()
    target_compile_options(PhoenixMcp PRIVATE -fvisibility=hidden)
endif()
if(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
    set_property(TARGET PhoenixMcp PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(PhoenixMcp PRIVATE
    phoenix_mcp
    reflectcpp
)
target_link_directories(PhoenixMcp PRIVATE
    build/linux/x86_64/release
    /home/artem.d/.local/share/vcpkg/installed/x64-linux/lib
)
target_link_options(PhoenixMcp PRIVATE
    -m64
)
# private sourcefiles from sourcebatch c++.build for target PhoenixMcp
target_sources(PhoenixMcp PRIVATE 
    src/main.cpp
)

# target
add_library(phoenix_mcp STATIC ""
        src/phoenix_mcp/transport/stdio_transport.cpp
        src/phoenix_mcp/transport/stdio_transport.h)
set_target_properties(phoenix_mcp PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "phoenix_mcp")
set_target_properties(phoenix_mcp PROPERTIES ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/linux/x86_64/release")
target_include_directories(phoenix_mcp SYSTEM PRIVATE
    /home/artem.d/.local/share/vcpkg/installed/x64-linux/include
)
target_compile_options(phoenix_mcp PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CUDA>:-DNDEBUG>
)
set_target_properties(phoenix_mcp PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(phoenix_mcp PRIVATE cxx_std_20)
if(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
    target_compile_options(phoenix_mcp PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-O2>)
else()
    target_compile_options(phoenix_mcp PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
else()
    target_compile_options(phoenix_mcp PRIVATE -fvisibility=hidden)
endif()
if(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
    set_property(TARGET phoenix_mcp PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(phoenix_mcp PRIVATE
    reflectcpp
)
target_link_directories(phoenix_mcp PRIVATE
    /home/artem.d/.local/share/vcpkg/installed/x64-linux/lib
)
target_link_options(phoenix_mcp PRIVATE
    -m64
)
# private sourcefiles from sourcebatch c++.build for target phoenix_mcp
target_sources(phoenix_mcp PRIVATE
        src/phoenix_mcp/transport/abstract_transport.cpp
    src/phoenix_mcp/server/abstract_server.cpp
    src/phoenix_mcp/server/stdio_server.cpp
)
